function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of statistical power to detect small but meaningful differences between subgroups","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disqualification from submission to the prospero database","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Observational nature of included studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of research on the influence of cultural factors on workplace viral transmission and interaction with covid-19 ipc measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective contact tracing methods and public engagement in contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language barriers as a primary challenge in implementing covid-19 ipc strategies in meatpacking plants with internationally diverse worker cohorts.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly changing nature of covid-19 management, control, and prevention guidelines","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consensus in the literature on the increased effectiveness of combined versus single measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in results from contact tracing interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distinct clusters of sars-cov-2 infection identified between staff with minimal resident contact.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with infection control processes in nursing homes leading to higher infection rates and mortality.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of staff compartmentalization and low-quality implementation of preventive measures leading to covid-19 outbreaks in long-term care facilities ltcfs .","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High proportion of cases needing to self-isolate and contacts needing to be traced","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic testing in settings with low to moderate sars-cov-2 transmission rates did little to stop outbreaks.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing alone was not enough to reduce r0 below 1 but effectively reduced transmission when paired with high-quality infection control practices.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The effectiveness of test and trace depends strongly on coverage and the timeliness of contact tracing.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare and nursing home workers testing positive for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential publication bias in the combined ipc measures studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Riesgo de p\\u00e9rdida de identidad corporativa y capacidad colectiva en el teletrabajo","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmisi\\u00f3n de persona a persona del virus sars-cov-2 a trav\\u00e9s del contacto directo.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
